content.html: Say I want to do a transform on a great many JSON files spread throughout a directory, but to minimize disruption I want to preserve whitespace whenever possible. Are there any JSON libraries for Python (or a similar language) that can do this (preserve existing whitespace)?
content.value:
Say I want to do a transform on a great many JSON files spread throughout a directory, but to minimize disruption I want to preserve whitespace whenever possible.

Are there any JSON libraries for Python (or a similar language) that can do this (preserve existing whitespace)?
